sys_monitoring/monitor_processes.description: A space separated list of processes to monitor process and thread count. Ex: winlogon.exe cmd.exe

sys_monitoring/monitor_files.description: A space separated list of files to be monitored. Full paths are required and patterns are accepted also. If a pattern matches more than one file, the latest modified file will be used. Ex: c:\tmp\a.txt d:\backups\mydb.*bak
